thread.title: Loud bangs after 'suspicious package' found outside Parliament...
thread.title_full: Loud bangs after 'suspicious package' found outside Parliament...

title: Loud bangs after 'suspicious package' found outside Parliament...
text:
POLICE have been called to a “suspicious package” yards from scene of Westminster terror attack. 
Witnesses reported hearing loud bangs and “explosions” near Parliament Square this evening. Suspiscious package found close to Westminster. 100m exclusion zone. V close to Treasury #WestminsterAttack pic.twitter.com/5Kg5TPoBWB 
— Laura Bundock (@laurabundock) March 23, 2017 
Police confirmed they had found a package near Buckingham Palace but officers had not carried out a controlled explosion. 
Officers have reportedly set up a 100m cordon, near to where mourners have gathered for a vigil in Trafalgar Square. 
A Met Police spokesman confirmed they were called to Birdcage Walk to reports of a suspicious package. 
More follows
